sub-events.comment: make him stop within a distance so he can tongue punch ya

Enemies late game or mid game can walljump and follow you up walls, Bosses can detect repeating movement and switch patterns to try and defeat the player. If no detectable pattern is found, do random attacks. We need one block high jumps for now

sub-events.comment: for each enemy in the enemy family check to see if they have line of sight to player. If not,
if each enemy has a positon set, move to it,
if enemy has encountered a wall, jump over it.
if enemy isnt within 20 pixels of its destination
if enemy has encountered a wall, jump over it.
